description: 100% natural high-tech active, Glucohyami is a purified dry extract of chicory root activator of hyaluronic acid synthesis. It is a natural and eco-friendly alternative to conventional glucosamine and hyaluronic acid. Innovative anti-aging cosmetic active ingredient derived from chicory root, Glucohyami is an extract whose name comes from two essential anti-aging molecules: glucosamine and hyaluronic acid. Standardized in maltodextrin, this tested cosmetic ingredient helps to improve hydration, firmness, and cellular renewal of the skin.
